column4: I get wacky characters in aptitude menu and my keyboard gets squirrely in VMWare, is there a setting I should be changing or something?
Like switching some encoding or what not?
you may be talking about two different things .. in vmware you have to install vmware tools to get better mouse/keyboard support.
you'd add the appropriate lines to xorg.conf.. I haven't heard that xorg is depriciated .. just that video isn't using it much unless you need to tweek it..
